name: Blob Helper
description:
What happens if you take away a genre's defining feature?  You can get all shorts of wacky ideas! Such as having an protective gooey friend!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

Thank you for anyone who played this game. I put a lot of time and effort to make sure that the level design was challenging but fair, making sure that the music wouldn't get repetitive after awhile, and that the game was full of energy.

Hope you enjoyed.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

Press R to Restart level 

Press S to Skip level
